description:
## Dictaphone - Voice and Audio Recorder

![Screenshot of Dictaphone](https://www.japplis.com/dictaphone/images/dictaphone-screenshot.png)

Dictaphone is a free audio recorder for your computer. It can be used to record memos.
        
        You can select the audio source like a microphone, webcam or desktop audio and record it.
        
        You can save the audio as .wav or .mp3 and export it as HTML.
        
        The window can remain always on top and be translucent.
author: Japplis
